inline_content.Text: Enums in Swift are much more powerful than some of their counterparts in other languages, such as

title:
var dir = Direction(oppositeTo: .down) // Direction.up

dir.changeDirection() // Direction.left

let opposite = dir.opposite // Direction.right

content_resolved.code:
var dir = Direction(oppositeTo: .down) // Direction.up

dir.changeDirection() // Direction.left

let opposite = dir.opposite // Direction.right
